headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Shipwreck on the Shores
content:
Treasure hunters and tourists are reporting sightings of a wooden boat washed up on the waterfront. The wreck is said to contain treasure and scraps of clothing, seven of which can be combined to form an outfit from a previous era. Should you spot it out on your travels, make sure to check for a chest filled with bounty.

Only one Shipwreck can be found per day — you can track whether you’ve found today’s Shipwreck via the Daily Collectibles section of the Interaction Menu.
